abstract: After a lawsuit from a Christian anti-abortion group, Google is now allowing religious organizations to take out ads using the keyword “abortion.”
snippet: After a lawsuit from a Christian anti-abortion group, Google is now allowing religious organizations to take out ads using the keyword “abortion.”
lead_paragraph: After a lawsuit from a Christian anti-abortion group, Google is allowing religious organizations to take out ads using the keyword “abortion,” a rare case of the search giant admitting it was wrong.

headline.main: Google in Shift on ‘Abortion’ as Keyword
headline.print_headline: Google in Shift On ‘Abortion’ As Keyword
